评论详情: These joggers are comfortable and at the perfect length for me.

I bought this pair because I cannot skip walking my dog in the city area even if its super cold outside like below 20F. They are holding up well so far to the cold and windy weather of NYC area. Satisfied with my purchase.
These are great - I just purchased for a cold week in chicago and they do not disappoint. I find the waist a little big but there is a string so that helps.

Took these on a trip where it was cold, snowy, and rainy. They kept me warm and dry. I bought a medium so that they were not too tight and they were perfect. Very well-made. Might be too warm for a warm house, but perfect for outside walking and chill environment
I think these are okay for the price. They're not as warm as you'd expect and they run really large, definitely size down if you want a fit closer to the ad photos.

This is my 2nd pair in a month because I love the fit, the look, and the quality! The high waist is perfect, the fit is relaxed but not baggy, the fleece lining is soft and warm, the deep zip pockets are super convenient for securing my cell and keys while working out. I love these joggers so much I am about to buy a third color.

They’re comfy, lightweight yet warm enough for about 20° weather (if it’s not too windy). It’s not too see through either. It runs very high-waisted. I’m 5’4, 120lbs and the small fits good, just a bit loose (but the drawstrings compensate for that)

These pants are great. Wore them to work and they were very comfortable. I ordered a large but I think I could have fit into a medium. Love the deep pockets. Don’t hesitate to buy these, you won’t be disappointed!

评论概述: Very warm and washes up nicely!

I wore some thermal pants under the jeans and the wind went right through them! Glad I bought three pairs :)!
Love the color, fit and warmth!
Just runs a little small is all. Thick and comfortable but snug and short for a tall woman.
This pants is no water proof. Defenly very bad!!

These fit great when I put them on, warm, high waisted the way I like but after just a couple of hours they were baggy in the legs.  I have a hard time believing these are 23% spandex because if they were there is no way they would be this baggy

I purchased these to wear while playing golf and they have been perfect. Had a few early morning tee times where temperatures were in the 40°s and my legs stayed warm. I’ve also worn with temps in the 20s while running errands and still warm. Nice jogger, very soft and comfort. Wash up well and look very nice.  I purchased these with a promo code and for the price, I’m very impressed Looking at purchasing another pair soon.

These stretch as you wear them. I am 5’7” and 135-140 lbs. I bought the medium, they fit when I tried them on and were really big by the end of the day. I then bought a small,  they fit better (more like the Lulu align joggers) but are too short. I wear them both but prefer the small, especially for pickleball.
It’s made with a thinner material.
These fleece lined pants are awesome. So comfortable and they look really nice. High quality.
I would give this a 5 star if it hadn’t taken 2 returns to finally get the desired color and size

I know that these are listed as high waisted joggers. However they are almost too high waisted for me. They feel good (the fleece inside) but they feel a bit odd in the way they fit. They are too big around the butt/hip area which is fine because they are joggers but since they are so high waisted they feel like the waist band is right at my rib cage. I need them to walk my dogs so I’m going to keep them.
These are comfortable, very high waisted if you are short.
These are well made, very nice material, and true to size.
I like these pants. They are lined, soft and warm.

I bought the camo (medium) and now I’m buying 2 more colors. They fit perfectly and the fabric is nice weight (not thin) and great quality. True to size. And I’m 5’0 and the length was fine ! I don’t think they’re good for above average height.
The pants are nice inside and smooth outside.
These are so warm and comfortable.  Bought them for other members of my family and everyone loves them.

These may be the most comfortable pants/joggers I’ve ever owned. Dressy enough to go to places you wouldn’t wear joggers. Warm. Lined with thin fleece, no bulk . I’m ordering more!
These are comfortable and fit well, but although they are soft inside, they are not "thermal" by any means and do not keep your legs warm in winter weather.
Arrived overnight, and I wore it same day - so comfortable, not tight, cozy/warm AND flattering. I loved the zippered pockets, and I plan on getting another pair. Great jogger style pants!!!!

I purchased these pants to wear to cold soccer games. I was hopefully after reading other reviews that I would like these pants. Sadly, I did not. The waistband is not wide and felt tight.

评论详情: I love these joggers. They are my go-to pants this winter. They are warm, they are flattering, and they have pockets with zippers, which is amazing. I got one pair to try them and they were perfect. Comfortable, fit well in the waist, and the length was good for me,I'm 5'5". Came back and bought 2 more colors.

LOVE these. Super comfortable, amazing soft cozy material, warm for New England winter. Highly recommend. I got a L and that’s the same size I get for old navy activewear and these fit great. Also nice length for those of us with longer inseams (sometimes joggers hit at my ankle bone which is fine for summer but not winter; these are nice and long).
These are a very flattering jogger.  They are soft on the inside and have not faded with washing.  They have stayed true to size and I’m hoping to purchase these in more colors. Great pant!
These are so great. Love the high waist. They are so soft and comfortable. Usually wear a 14 or XL and the XL fits perfectly.
They fit true to size, comfortable and warm. I tried a pair and ended up ordering 2 more colors.

These leggings were priced well, true to size, and wash well. They are flattering on my daughter as well. Fleece isn't for warmth, but makes them more comfortable. They didn't shrink, but the waist string did come out in the wash so I would recommend fastening prior to washing.

Love that it's not too thick or thin. I did have to get a size bigger. The measurements are a bit off. The X-Small would have been perfect but it was snug. The Small was better but a bit looser than I would want it. All in all, I love it!
I love it

Hands down the best leggings I’ve ever purchased. They are soft, comfortable, warm and I love the thickness of them. They aren’t too thick, but they’re also not super thin like some can be. I will be buying more pairs!

These are so awesome! I have been wearing them as scrub pants during this cold snap and they keep me nice and toasty while looking great. Not too thick, which I was worried about at first and fits true to size - I bought a medium and I am 5’6” and 160lbs.

These joggers are amazing! They are comfortable and fit perfectly. I've worn these at my yoga class and for outdoor activities. I typically wear a Large and these did not disappoint. They fit perfectly.

the material looks expensive and it is well made. it is very nice and fits me very well well. the waist is where it should be and the zippered pockets is big enough for iphone and other stuffs. I have not wash it yet but I do not anticipate any shrinking.I highly recommend recommend this pants

I am about 140 lbs 5’4 in height with an athletic build. I usually wear a medium/large and I ordered a size medium. The medium fits me well. It’s stretchy so it doesn’t dig into my waist or hips. I like the fleece on the inside. They are a tight-ish fit though so I will probably order another pair that is a size Large when I want to layer some fleece tights underneath. I am very happy with this product and I will be purchasing more of these pants.

I bought these to go on walks outside in the Michigan winter. I usually run fairly warm especially when walking so I needed something that allowed air, yet kept me warm. They are perfect. They aren't too think that they are heavy, and are very soft.
I love these pants. I love the zipper pockets to keep my phone safe. I am 5’8” and the pants are a good length on me. The pants keep me warm without overheating.

The material is thick and warm without making them look bulky.  The silhouette is flattering.  I love that the pockets also zip BUT the zippers are cleverly hidden so they don’t awkwardly bow out when unzipped.  I will definitely be buying again!

I received them fast ( overnight). It's low 30's/40's here ( Florida) this morning and they were amazing when I was walking my dog. I was not cold at all.  They fit great! I'm 5'1" and about 150lbs, got the Large and they fit perfect, no shrinking after washing and drying.
Disappointed they arrived with a hole in the pocket.
Very pretty colors and fits well keeps you warm.

These are a nice weight. They feel a little bit thicker compared to another brand. I also bought on Amazon the pockets have a zipper, which is a nice function if needed. Also, I like that they are Matte not shiny.
These pants are warm without being too warm and so comfy and cute!
Comfortable and warm; very high waisted. Not for plus size women, runs small
Love these! I wear joggers to work and until now couldn't find any that were insulated. These are perfect! I have to go outside occasionally when at work and these pants keep me nice and warm.
I’ve lived in these nonstop since I purchased them. They’re so comfy, lightweight - yet warm and I love the zipper pocket that is not bulky on the side. Now ordered more! Greta find.

I got these primarily for walking my pack of dogs in rainy or windy weather. I'm 5 ft and 100lbs ordered a small. They fit great and are the most comfortable pants I own. Not overly warm, but not thin either. A nice mid-weight warmth. Pockets are plenty big enough for my phone in one and dog training treats in the other. They look much better and more flattering than my usual jogging/sweatpants. I will be buying a couple more of these!
I like these joggers very much but at 35.00 a pair it's a little too much.
Love these pants! So warm and comfortable. I want to buy a pair in every color !
I am beyond happy! These joggers are stylish, comfy, and flattering ! Highly recommend

So happy with these pants! The weight is perfect; warm without bulk, and they are very well made. They would be perfect if they were made for petites; they are a bit high waisted and long for me,  but I’m keeping them.
These are not super thick joggers. They are perfect for every day wear in the winter time. The thickness is perfect for winter temps
Super soft and comfy.  True to size. Would definitely recommend!
Love these. Warm on these really cold days! Love the zipper pockets too! Put them ion when they were delivered today and haven’t taken them off yet!
I ordered these ahead of the freezing weather that’s coming. They are keeping me very warm. I like the high waist. I’m 5’6”, 135 lbs. I ordered size Large. Very comfortable.
Quality fleece lined jogger. Will buy more.

I’m 5’6” and weigh 185, and I got the large. I would have liked a looser fit so I might exchange for an XL, but they are very comfy. The pockets are big enough to fit a smart phone. I like that they are zippered! They seem like a really good quality for the price.

The size is just right. When I opened the package at first glance they looked to small but once I tried them on they fit perfect the material thickness is great. There is no shrinkage when they are washed I feel these pants a very good value for the money. I have since bought a second pair. I especially like the pockets on each side to put my cell phone and mother small items such as my keys in. These pockets are deep and you don’t have to be concerned with anything working its way out of them

When I first got this product. It didn’t feel like I thought it might from the description. But they are very comfortable. Especially as the weather is extra cold now. I went for a brisk walk outside and I had to move quick, I did not see an obstacle in front of me and went down on my knee . And went on with my 4 mile walk. I later noticed that I had a large tear in my skin, but not an ounce of damage to these pants except some blood on the inside!  I can’t think of anything else that is a better description of durability and quality of pants. I decided I was ordering another pair in a different color to carry on with my outdoor winter activities.
They’re comfortable. Soft. Think I should have sized down. May exchange. But, I like them.

These are the most comfortable joggers I've ever worn.  They are warm, look good on and the legs don't creep up.  It's 28* at my house and these pants kept my legs warm while I was out walking around.  I like them so well I'm buying more of them, we are going to have a long cold winter!!

I just walked my usual 4 miles in 16 degrees with wind chill at 1 degree. I purchased these for warmth. Had high hopes and they were met! Warm, soft inside. No chaffing on legs. Kept wind out. PERFECT!
I liked everything about theses except the fact they are tighter than expected. Size up

I haven’t worn these in snow or wet weather yet, but I did test the legs under the shower head and they are definitely water proof. That said, they are THE MOST COMFORTABLE snow/waterproof pants I have ever worn. They’re like warm yoga pants, but better. I sat crisscross applesauce for 30 minutes to test the elasticity and no saggy pants bottom. They’re flattering to my shape, are not bulky at all, stretchy enough to wear thermals underneath in snowy conditions, waterproof against a shower head, and they don’t make that zippy sound that regular snow pants make when you walk. They also have deep pockets with zippers so the pockets don’t make the weird flappy bulges that most pant pockets make after you actually use the pockets. I’ll update this post in a couple of weeks after I wear them in Boston winter conditions and wash them, but so far - I need them in all the colors.

I LOVE these joggers!! I ordered 2 pair, tried them out, and ordered 4 more pair. I am a truck driver, in and out of the truck multiple times in a shift. I had to wear a different fleece lined pant on a windy, cold, rainy day and froze to death. I immediately ordered 4 more pairs. Fit is perfect. Warmth is exactly what I hoped for. Water repellent is perfect. If you're unsure- ordered one pair. You will want multiple. I am 5'6" 185 lbs. Ordered the large.
I've tried a few lined pants for the midwest winter. This one IS IT. And oh my gosh, they feel like heaven. Leggings meet velvetty sweatpants.
I bought large and kept great for lounging at home. Now I  want medium for casual work days.  High quality feel.
Very heavy weight for winter, buying another pair.
These are so comfy. Nice warmth without being too warm. I'm on my fourth color now. Fit good, I like the pockets. With a nicer top, you can't even tell they're joggers
These are comfy and appear to be waterproof though I haven't worn them in a heavy rain yet. Back pockets would have been nice, but the front pockets are roomy and zip closed. They'll do the job.

The army green ones I purchased had a black liner and they are too big although they are the same size as my previous order. If I knew which ones had the white lining I would purchase more but only purchase them.

I love these joggers, so great for cold weather! I have two pairs and just ordered a third! Definitely recommend!!!

This is my second pair. I really like them. They fit well and are thick enough to be warm in. Interestingly enough pet hair hardly sticks to them which is great when you have pets. I would recommend these joggers. They are very high waisted.
Good fit. Well made but the material is a bit like rubber.  I wear them walking the dog.  Very suitable for that and any outside task.

I love that the fleece is thin. They aren't bulky like other lined joggers that I've tried.  The zippered pockets are fantastic because I don't have to worry about anything falling out. I've washed and dried them 4 times already with no shrinkage

I was looking for something that I could pull on for winter over thermals and leggings.  I didn't want bulky - so far these have really done the jo. They are not as windproof as I hoped, but right now I have 7 degree weather with wind chill. I think these will be great for hiking/walking in 30 degree and up weather.  There is a soft lining on the inside of the fabric for warmth, but I have only worn them layered so far. I really like the outer material is not collecting dog hair like other fabrics. The waist is high, but the drawstring makes it easy to adjust. Overall I am really pleased with the weight, fit and feel of these.  The only thing I don't care for is the vertical front pockets with zipper. I have grown accustomed to more of a side pocket, like on yoga pants, but it's not a deal breaker at all.
These are my new favorite! Buttery soft, perfect fit! Lovelovelove!! Going to buy more!! Highly recommend!
San Antonio decided to get cold and I bought these just in time🔥🔥🔥🔥
Bought  these for my daughter who goes to school in a cold climate. She really likes them.

评论概述: I couldn't love these pants more!
评论详情: The first pair I sized up and I definitely shouldn't have, this pair i ordered my correct size and they fit fantastic.
I love wearing joggers, but they just aren’t warm enough in winter. Enter these lined joggers and the game has changed! They are SO warm and cozy. I’ll be ordering more!
